page.title: 13CHANGING TIMES IN OTTERTON.
page.content:
We asked Mr Payne, Mrs Miller and Mr and Mrs Saunders, who have all lived in the village most of their life, what they noticed about how times have changed in Otterton. Here is a summary:- 1. Cob houses knocked down and rebuilt 2. Development of new houses. 3. The Mill has turned from a working mill into an exhibition place. 4. The population hasn't increased, because years ago people had larger familes. 5. More holiday makers visit Otterton because of Ladram Bay Caravan Park. 6. Years ago it used to be more of a family community because you knew everyone. 7. There used to be a railway line,now closed.The station is now a house.
Research by:-M.Turbitt;K.Pring;N.Davie
